item.title: All the Reasons You're Unemployed
item.description: Note: This post is an edit of a medium post that showed up in my inbox. I’ve been told it’s probably a good idea to read the original medium article first.

item.title: Star Wars Pricing
item.description: Ben Obi-Wan Kenobi: Let’s just say we’d like to avoid any Imperial entanglements. Han Solo: Well, that’s the real trick isn’t it?

item.title: Getting started with Hugo
item.description: I took the time to get Hugo set up to replace my long neglected personal blog. Here is the story.

item.title: A Box of Agile
item.description: Just a round-up of the stationery I normally buy to help in professional contexts. It’s useful to have it all in the same list.

item.title: GOV.UK wins Design of the Year!
item.description: For the past several months, I’ve been working on building out gov.uk. More precisely, the Inside Government team, working up new product development and content transition.
